content.description: Six identical resistors, each with resistance <math alttext="2.0 ohms" overflow="scroll"><mn>2.0</mn><mspace width="0.2em"></mspace><mtext>Î©</mtext></math>, are connected to a <math alttext="12 volt" overflow="scroll"> <mn>12</mn> <mspace width="0.2em"> </mspace> <mtext>V</mtext> </math> battery, as shown.
content.question: What is the current in the battery?
